info.name: Disruptor Beam Dark
info.description: A theme for the Disruptor Beam forums for those that prefer something other than the traditional white and blue that is offered.  Please note: tested and used in Firefox, it has NOT been tested in Chrome as of yet.
info.additionalInfo:
v 1.2 - Mostly complete save for a few tweaks.

v 1.0 - Still a work in progress but at a stage where its easier on the eyes.
